events.message: I received the package today but unfortunately the product has a large scratch on its surface and doesn't look new at all.
Based on the customer's complaint about a scratch and damage, the issue is categorized as a Product Defect.
The case has been assigned to agent Lisa M. in the product quality support team for further assistance.
Hello, this is Lisa from the support team. I'm sorry to hear your product arrived damaged. Let's get this sorted out for you.
Could you please send us some photos of the scratch and the packaging it arrived in? This will help us process your request faster.
I've attached several clear photos showing the scratch on the product as well as the box it came in.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement at no extra cost or a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know which option you would like.
I would like to go for the replacement option. Please arrange the shipment as soon as possible.
We have processed the replacement order and you should receive a shipping confirmation shortly. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to confirm that your replacement product has arrived and is in perfect condition. Please reach out if you need anything else.
Since we have not heard back and the replacement was delivered successfully, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
